attributes.action: REMOVE the requirement on this site to confirm your email address after each signature on a petition
attributes.additional_details:
This petition site requires each user to confirm their signature by clicking on an email each time they sign a petition on here.

This is blatantly designed to reduce the number of signatures on these petitions, as many do not read that email, and the warning message after signing, thinking that they have signed and been counted, but unless you click the email, it won’t count.

This petition is to remove this unnecessary requirement, so that all petitions are easier to sign and be counted for.
